question: ####UFAQ [Damon Stone] If the Runner starts their turn with [Out of the Ashes](/en/card/10080) in their heap and Emptied Mind installed, does the Runner still gain if during the run from Out of the Ashes they discard all the cards in grip to using Faust?
answer: Yes, Emptied Mind checks the number of cards in grip when its ability resolves. If other simultaneous effects are triggered before Emptied Mind, then the check will wait until those effects are fully resolved.
